Package edu.iit.sat.itmd4515.sargula.web

Class TeacherLessonController

java.lang.Object
edu.iit.sat.itmd4515.sargula.web.TeacherLessonController
@Named @RequestScoped public class TeacherLessonController extends Object
StudentAssignmentController is a JSF lightweight controller which manages the logic of Teacher working with Lessons. This includes creating, editing, viewing or deleting lessons.
Author:
sargula
